meanings.sent1: She poeticizes her thoughts in a journal.
meanings.sent2: The poet poeticizes nature in her verses.
meanings.sent3: He poeticizes even the most mundane events.
meanings.sent4: The artist poeticizes the chaos of the city.
meanings.sent5: The writer poeticizes emotions with vivid imagery.

meanings.definition: To treat in a poetic manner.
meanings.sent1: The teacher poeticizes history to engage students.
meanings.sent2: He poeticizes his love for her in every letter.
meanings.sent3: She poeticizes her morning routine with a song.
meanings.sent4: The director poeticizes the film with beautiful cinematography.
meanings.sent5: The musician poeticizes the silence with haunting melodies.
